page.title: 09CHILDREN'S LEISURE-COBHAM
page.content:
There is a lot children can do in Cobham in their leisure time.
For sport you can join clubs for gymnastics, Karate, soccer, rugby and fishing. You can also cycle and walk in Cobham but for swimming we use Leatherhead or Walton. There are classes for ballet, tap, modern and disco dancing.
Cobham has 2 Brownie and 2 Cub packs, Scouts, Guides and Rangers for older children. St. John's Ambulance and Red Cross meet here too.
Readers borrow books from Cobham library. At home we play. watch TV, sew, knit, draw, paint, make models and spend time with our pets.
